Header: World’s biggest country duo of all time, Bellamy Brothers arrive in the island
Content: The World’s biggest country duo of all time, 'The Bellamy Brothers' arrived In the island yesterday to perform at 'The Bellamy Brothers Live in Concert' tomorrow at the Sri Lanka Exhibition and Convention Center in Colombo. Gates will open at 7 pm and tickets are sold out. 'The Bellamy Brothers' will be performing tomorrow at the SLECC along with a special act by the world-renowned tribute band 'ABBA Forever'.
